channel.title: Python on Bas-Man's Ponderings
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Bas-Man's Ponderings

item.title: Modules
item.description: This is a list of modules that I am interested in using. Pendulm An alternative to the datetime module pyfakefs Mock your file system calls. inflect Automatically plurualise words Deprecated Deprecate code in Python. netaddr Layer 3 handling for IP Addresses
